00052 inline
00053 void linear_bump(
00054                  miState* const state,
00055                  vector& dPds, vector& dPdt,
00056                  const miScalar gradu, const miScalar gradv
00057                  )
00058 {
00059    state->normal += gradu * dPds + gradv * dPdt;
00060 }

00077 inline
00078 void bump(
00079           miState* const state,
00080           const vector& dPds, const vector& dPdt,
00081           const miScalar gradu, const miScalar gradv
00082           )
00083 {
00084    vector Ng = dPds ^ dPdt;
00085    vector A  = state->normal ^ dPds;
00086    vector B  = state->normal ^ dPdt;
00087 
00088    vector D = gradu * A - gradv * B;
00089 
00090    miScalar glen = math<float>::sqrt(gradu * gradu + gradv * gradv);
00091 
00092    miScalar len = D.lengthSquared();
00093    if ( len ) len = Ng.lengthSquared() / len;
00094    else       len = 1.0f;
00095    
00096    vector DP = D * glen * len;
00097 
00098    
00099    miTag obj;
00100    mi_query( miQ_INST_ITEM, NULL, state->instance, &obj );
00101    
00102    int type;
00103    mi_query( miQ_OBJ_TYPE, NULL, obj, &type );
00104    
00105    if ( type == 0 )
00106    {
00107       // we are dealing with a mesh... add normal difference
00108       miVector Ndiff = state->normal - state->normal_geom;
00109       state->normal += DP;
00110       state->normal += Ndiff;
00111    }
00112    else
00113    {
00114       // A surface.  No need to compensate.
00115       state->normal += DP;
00116    }
00117 
00118    mi_vector_normalize(&state->normal);
00119 }

00125 inline
00126 void parallax_bump(
00127                    miVector2d& offset,  // offset for texture indices
00128                    const miState* const state,
00129                    const miScalar amt,
00130                    const miScalar scale,
00131                    const miScalar bias = 0.5f,
00132                    const int idx = 0
00133                    )
00134 {
00135    vector dPds( kNoInit ), dPdt( kNoInit );
00136    if ( ! dPdst( dPds, dPdt, state, idx ) ) {
00137       offset.u = offset.v = 0.0f;
00138       return;
00139    }
00140 
00141    dPds.normalize();
00142    dPdt.normalize();
00143    miScalar Au = math<float>::acos( state->dir % dPds );
00144    miScalar Av = math<float>::acos( state->dir % dPdt );
00145    offset.u = math<float>::tan( Au ) * amt * scale;
00146    offset.v = math<float>::tan( Av ) * amt * scale;
00147 }

00149 inline
00150 void parallax_bump(
00151                    const miState* const state,
00152                    const miScalar amt,
00153                    const miScalar scale,
00154                    const miScalar bias = 0.5f,
00155                    const int idx = 0
00156                    )
00157 {
00158    vector dPds( kNoInit ), dPdt( kNoInit );
00159    if ( ! dPdst( dPds, dPdt, state, idx ) )
00160       return;
00161 
00162    dPds.normalize();
00163    dPdt.normalize();
00164    miScalar Au = math<float>::acos( state->dir % dPds );
00165    miScalar Av = math<float>::acos( state->dir % dPdt );
00166 
00167    miVector2d offset = { 
00168    math<float>::tan( Au ) * amt * scale,
00169    math<float>::tan( Av ) * amt * scale
00170    };
00171 
00172    int* n;
00173    mi_query( miQ_NUM_TEXTURES, const_cast<miState*>(state), miNULLTAG, &n );
00174 
00175    // Apply offset to all texture indices
00176    for (int i = 0; i < (*n); ++i )
00177    {
00178       state->tex_list[i].x += offset.u;
00179       state->tex_list[i].y += offset.v;
00180    }
00181 }

00186 inline
00187 void calculatenormal( miState* const state,
00188                       const vector& dPds, const vector& dPdt )
00189 {
00190 
00191    vector newN = dPds ^ dPdt;
00192    newN.normalize();
00193    
00194    state->dot_nd = state->dir % newN;
00195    if ( state->dot_nd > 0 )
00196    {
00197       state->dot_nd = -state->dot_nd;
00198       state->normal = -newN;
00199       state->inv_normal = miTRUE;
00200    }
00201    else
00202    {
00203       state->normal = newN;
00204       state->inv_normal = miFALSE;
00205    }
00206 }

00211 inline
00212 void calculatenormal( miState* const state )
00213 {
00214    mi_vector_normalize(&state->normal);
00215    
00216    state->dot_nd = state->dir % state->normal;
00217    if ( state->dot_nd > 0 )
00218    {
00219       state->dot_nd = -state->dot_nd;
00220       state->normal = -state->normal;
00221       state->inv_normal = miTRUE;
00222    }
00223    else
00224    {
00225       state->inv_normal = miFALSE;
00226    }
